pullRequest.title: [RW-5148][risk=no] Fix user creation via directory service
pullRequest.bodyText:
This was a simple regression due to some refactoring I'd done in #3708. It turns out our Profile API model uses 'username' with a different meaning than our codebase, which I overlooked.

PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 This PR includes appropriate unit tests

commit.message: Fix user creation via directory service.

nodes.bodyText: Can you make it "full GSuite email address" so it's more foolproof?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5024,7 +5024,9 @@ definitions:
         type: integer
         format: int64
       username:
-        description: researchallofus username
+        description: 'The username prefix, e.g. "gjordan". Note that this is different
+          from the use of "username" elsewhere in the RW codebase, where username represents
+          the full email address.'

nodes.bodyText: To make the errors or debug info clearer, I'd make this look more like a domain, e.g. "bobby.com".
